actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt small manufacturer and producers from the excise tax on firearms.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt manufacturers and producers of firearms who produce less than 50 such firearms during the taxable year from the excise tax on firearms.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt small manufacturer and producers from the excise tax on firearms.
